parsed.name: Bob Smith
parsed.summary: Software engineer with experience in backend development using Python and Django. Familiar with database design and REST API development. Interested in learning frontend frameworks.

justification: The candidate's resume strongly aligns with the core requirements of the entry-level Data Engineer position, specifically citing proficiency in Python and SQL which are listed as key skills in the job description. The experience in backend and API development demonstrates a solid programming foundation well-suited for a data engineering role. The candidate's stated interest in learning new frameworks also matches the job's emphasis on being a curious and quick learner.
